messages.subject: need speaker for FL LLL conference
messages.msgSnippet: My friend is in charge of organizing the speakers for the LLL conference in FL this Sept. There is a panel discussion on educational choices and she has
messages.messageBody:
My friend is in charge of organizing the speakers for the LLL
conference in FL this Sept. There is a panel discussion on educational
choices and she has traditional school, Waldorf, Montessori, and
generic hs covered. I told her I would help with unschooling - but I
do not think I will be comfortable representing unschooling as I have
a 4, 2 and newborn. I love to talk about it, but am not up to
defending how kids learn to read (etc.) without a curriculum bc I have
not been through that yet.

Anyone in FL, planning on going to conference? I can put you in touch
to be on the panel.

Email me off list if you are interested. Thanks!
Amy
